overview: Benjamin and Otto enjoy the nice weather and try their hand at the ice rink. Instead of skates, the elephant uses two frying pans for skating. Maria, who can spin beautiful pirouettes, joins her friends. The girl dreams of performing in a revue on ice. Benjamin and Otto agree that Maria should portray the princess. Unfortunately, Jasmin's mother does everything to make her daughter an ice-skating star. Wanting to help Maria, Benjamin comes up with an idea to resolve this conflict.
title: Benjamin Blümchen und die Eisprinzessin
